title: The Earle of Essex his letter to the Earle of Southampton in the time of his troubles containing many pious expressions and very comfortable for such are in any troubles, Septemb. 29, 1642.
author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1566-1601.
publisher: Printed by Luke Norton for T.T.,
notes: Reprinted in 1643 as: A precious and most divine letter.
This item can be found at reel 184:3 and at reel 247:E.119, no. 7.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Thomason Collection, British Library.
